data.title: Heads roll at AOL as ad push struggles
data.meta_description: AOL, the company that introduced millions of people to the internet, has tried to reinvent itself many times. The latest effort - like those before it - doesn't seem to be going very well.
data.text:
AOL, the company that introduced millions of people to the internet, has tried to reinvent itself many times. The latest effort - like those before it - doesn't seem to be going very well.

This week, Jeffrey Bewkes, the chief executive of AOL's parent company, Time Warner, acknowledged weakness in the business and said he was open to combining AOL with another group - "whatever configuration makes it the strongest and the most valuable".
